message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at a price of $13,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a bit higher than I'd like to pay, but I'm willing to make a serious offer.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $11,000
